original_text: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
korean_text: 그러면 어떻게 할까 내가 영으로 기도하고 또 마음으로 기도하며 내가 영으로 찬송하고 또 마음으로 찬송하리라

sentences.original_text: I will pray with the spirit,
and I will pray with understanding also:
I will sing with the spirit,
and I will sing with understanding also.
